original_text: beware lest you act corruptly by making a carved image for yourselves, in the form of any figure, the likeness of male or female,
korean_text: 그리하여 스스로 부패하여 자기를 위해 어떤 형상대로든지 우상을 새겨 만들지 말라 남자의 형상이든지, 여자의 형상이든지,

sentences.original_text: by making a carved image for yourselves
in the form of any figure
the likeness of male or female
